import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import "./user-profile.css" import * as firebase from "firebase/app"; import "firebase/auth" import fire from "../fire"; //required! function UserProfile(props){ const [showClearButton, setClearButton] = useState(false) const handleCloseMenu = () => { props.handleHideProfile() } const handleSignOut = () => { firebase .auth() .signOut() .then(props.setIsLoggedIn(false)) } const handleClearShow = () => { setClearButton(true) } const handleClearHide = () => { setClearButton(false) } const handleClearAll = () => { props.setUserData(prevState => ({...prevState, savedItems: ""})) firebase.auth().currentUser.updateProfile({photoURL: ""}) } return(

Hi {props.userData.displayName}

Welcome to your personal pannel.
Here you can view all your saved items.

{props.userData.savedItems ? props.userData.savedItems : "No Saved Events"}

{props.userData.savedItems ? !showClearButton ?
:

Are you sure?

: null}
) } export default UserProfile
